purpleculture_pinyin:
kuò
to enlarge
увеличить
rtega_mnemonic:
擴擴RS
扩扩		拡expand, enlarge, stretch
  • hand 扌 making something broader 廣/广/広
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 扩)
Pictophonetic: 扌 indicates the sound; 廣 (wide) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
擴大 [ kuò dà ]: to expand; to enlarge; to broaden one's scope
擴散 [ kuò sàn ]: to spread; to proliferate; to diffuse; spread; proliferation; diffusion
擴張 [ kuò zhāng ]: expansion; dilation; to expand (e.g. one's power or influence); to broaden
擴展 [ kuò zhǎn ]: to extend; to expand; extension; expansion
擴建 [ kuò jiàn ]: to extend (a building, an airport runway etc)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 廣 [ guǎng ] broad, vast, wide; building, house
heisig_chinese_memo: When I use the internet I constantly have to use my fingers to enlarge the screen content (i.e. zoom in) because my eyesight isn't very good.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: As the view enlarges and you near the edge of the cliff, your fingers start to tremble in excitement for the full view you hiked all this way for.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " hand " to " broad " sound. The original meaning is promotion and expansion. "Jade articles. "Hand": "Expanded, the meaning of introducing Zhang." Such as "Mencius. "Gongsun Chou Shang": "Whoever has four ends to me, knowing is expanded and full, if the fire begins, the spring begins to reach." Zhao Qi's note: "Expand, outline." Learn six. Perseverance: "There are few discontinuities, but it is not difficult to keep up with knowledge, expand and enrich it.

" Expansion " means broad and broad. Such as "Lun Heng. Feeling Void": "If music can disrupt yin and yang, it can also adjust yin and yang. Why do kings need to cultivate themselves and practice good governance?" Zhang Xuecheng of the Qing Dynasty, "Wenshi Tongyi. "Distinction": "People have this same heart, and the same heart has the same reason; the universe has expanded, and the history is diversified. An Neng will surely say that the ancients will speak evil!"
humanum_short_description_en: From " hand " to " wide " sound. The original meaning is promotion and expansion.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「廣」聲。本義是推廣、張大。《玉篇．手部》：「擴，引張之意。」如《孟子．公孫丑上》：「凡有四端於我者，知皆擴而充之矣，若火之始然，泉之始達。」趙岐注：「擴，廓也。」《朱子語類．學六．持守》：「少有間斷，而察識存養，擴而充之，皆不難乎為力矣。」

　　「擴」引申表示廣、廣闊。如《論衡．感虛》：「樂能亂陰陽，則亦能調陰陽也，王者何須脩身正行，擴施善政？」清代章學誠《文史通義．辨似》：「人同此心，心同此理；宇宙遼擴，故籍紛揉，安能必其所言古人皆來言邪！」
humanum_short_description: 從「手」，「廣」聲。本義是推廣、張大。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
擴 (Simplified: 扩)
Pinyin: kuò
English Definition: to enlarge
Total strokes: 18; Radical: 手
Pictophonetic: 扌 indicates the sound; 廣 (wide) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 廣 [ guǎng ] broad, vast, wide; building, house
Example Words:
擴大 [ kuò dà ]: to expand; to enlarge; to broaden one's scope
擴散 [ kuò sàn ]: to spread; to proliferate; to diffuse; spread; proliferation; diffusion
擴張 [ kuò zhāng ]: expansion; dilation; to expand (e.g. one's power or influence); to broaden
擴展 [ kuò zhǎn ]: to extend; to expand; extension; expansion
擴建 [ kuò jiàn ]: to extend (a building, an airport runway etc)
More: 擴* | *擴 | *擴*

Liushutong characters (3)

擴字的基本解释

擴
kuò
见“扩”。

擴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuò］
［《集韻》闊鑊切，入鐸，溪。］
亦作“挄1”。“扩1”的繁体字。
(1)推广；张开。
(2)广；广阔。

擴字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　擴； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页461第04
【集韻】【韻會】闊霍切【正韻】苦郭切，?音廓。張小使大也。【孟子】知皆擴而充之矣，或作㨯。　又【集韻】【韻會】?光霍切，音郭。義同。　又【集韻】忽郭切，音霍。又古獲切，音幗。義?同。又古曠切，光去聲。充也。與撗同。　又【唐韻】【集韻】?胡曠切，黃去聲。搥打也。與攩同。

擴字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
擴字的起名意思

暂无。
